# pytorch-iga

## Quick start

```bash
pip install pytorch-iga
```

```python
from iga import IGA
```

## Contributing

```bash
# to publish
make clean
make build
bash run.sh publish:prod

# clone the repo
git clone https://github.com/phitoduck/pytorch-iga.git

# install the dev dependencies
make install

# run the tests
make test
```
